name: Seduce Me - An Otome Visual Novel
blurb: A romantic comedy visual novel centered around a girl named Mika Anderson, who gets entangled in the affairs of incubi.

rewards.reward: ~ Wink To You ~\r\n~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\r\nThank you for your contribution! Every donation counts. Your name will be listed in the credits.
~ Wink And A Hug ~\r\n~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\r\nYour name in the credits, a heartfelt thank you digital card, and a MP3 file of all five incubi giving their thanks!

~ A Lil' Love ~\r\n~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\r\nEverything above and a digital copy of the game\u2019s artbook filled with concept sketches, art made exclusively for the book, developer commentary, and more.
~ First Date ~\r\n~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\r\nEverything above and beta test access to the full game of Seduce Me 2 weeks before release!
~ Photobooth ~\r\n~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\r\nEverything above and a pack of digital wallpapers (1920x1080) of the lovable incubi (James, Erik, Sam, Matthew, and Damien).

~ Surprise Kiss!! ~\r\n~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\r\nEverything listed above, the digital wallpaper pack, and a special personalized mp3 file (1min) from your favorite incubus. (Not Included In Other Rewards)

~Modeling Job!~ ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\r\nYou'll get the "Photobooth" reward and a personal commission from the lovely artist of Seduce Me, Maltagliati. (1 Person, full body, simple background, safe for work only)

~ A Love Letter!! ~ ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Everything listed above, the digital wallpaper pack, a special personalized mp3 file (1min) from your favorite incubus, AND a personalized love letter (pdf) sent directly from your favorite incubus. (Not Included In Other Rewards)

~ Say My Name! ~\r\n~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\r\n"Photobooth" Reward and a small 3-5 minute Mini "Seduce Me" Visual Novel personalized for YOU! Get yourself paired with your favorite incubus and have him actually say your name! (Not included In Other Rewards)
~Dream of Me~ ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\r\nYou'll get the "Photobooth" reward and a digital dakimakura (2 sided!) of your favorite incubi.
~ Something To Remember Me By ~\r\n~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\r\n"Photobooth!" reward and a physical copy of the game\u2019s art book.
~ Token Of Affection ~\r\n~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\r\n"Photobooth!" reward, the physical art book, and a limited-edition 11x17 poster.

~ Seduce Me! ~\r\n~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\r\n"Photobooth!" reward, the copy of the physical art book, a limited edition 11x17 poster, a limited edition set of stickers featuring the game's characters, AND get your character into a CG Background!!

~ CAMEO ~\r\n~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\r\nHave your character appear in the game briefly. A sprite set and a few lines of dialogue will be provided. (Includes "Seduce Me!" reward minus the background cg character)

~SIDE CHARACTER ~\r\n~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\r\nInsert a side story in the game featuring your own character. Includes a sprite set and CGs. (Includes "Seduce Me!" reward minus the background cg character)

~A FRESH ROSE~ ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\r\nIncludes "SIDE CHARACTER" reward tier, PLUS... get a three-day pass to Anime Central, being held from May 16th-May 18th in Rosemont, Illinois. After the Voiceiyuu official panel, you're invited out to an exclusive dinner with members of the Cast and Crew of Seduce Me for an evening you'll never forget! (Transportation/Lodging is NOT included!)

~NIGHT ON THE TOWN~ ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\r\nIncludes "SIDE CHARACTER" reward tier, PLUS... Spend a night on the town with producer Michaela Laws and Voice Actor Jonah Scott in the beautiful "Windy City" of Chicago, Illinois! Aside from taking you through the popular attractions of the area, they'll provide lunch and dinner to make the most of your night out. (Transportation/Lodging is NOT included!!!)
